## hc_theme_elementary
Elementary (OS) theme for highcharts

#### Description 

Elementary (OS) theme for highcharts based on https://elementary.io

#### Usage 
<pre><code>
hc_theme_elementary(...)
</code></pre>
 
#### Arguments 
 
* ``...``: Named argument to modify the theme

#### Examples 
```{r}
highcharts_demo() %>%
hc_add_theme(hc_theme_elementary())

```
